classitems.description: Gets a nested property. You can use either `foo.bar` or `foo[bar]` to get the nested property.

classitems.description:
Gets the language code. The form of language code may be `en` or `zh-tw`.
When the language is not defined, it returns `default`.
classitems.name: _getCode

classitems.description:
Environment variables.

This object contains the following attributes:

  - debug: Determines whether debug mode is on.
  - safe: Determines whether safe mode is on.
  - silent: Determines whether silent mode is on.
  - env: Node.js environment variable. Default to `development`.
  - version: Hexo version number.
  - init: Determines whether Hexo has been initalized.
classitems.name: env

classitems.description: Checks if the given `path` is renderable.
classitems.name: isRenderable

classitems.description: Checks if the given `path` is renderable by synchronized renderer.

classitems.description:
Formats URL.

This function does:

- Removes the prefixed slash.
- Appends `index.html` if the URL has trailing slash.
- Replaces all backslashes with slash.
classitems.name: format

classitems.description:
Creates a new log on debug level.

`debug` is also alias as `d`.
classitems.name: debug

classitems.description:
Creates a new log on info level.

`info` is also alias as `i`.
classitems.name: info

classitems.description:
Creates a new log on warn level.

`warn` is also alias as `w`.
classitems.name: warn

props.name: title
props.description: Post title

props.name: slug
props.description: Post slug. If not defined, the value will be escaped `data.title`.

props.name: layout
props.description: Post layout. If not defined, the value will be `default_layout` in global configuration.

props.name: date
props.description: Post date. If not defined, the value will be `Date.now()`.

params.name: replace
params.description: Determines whether to replace existing data.

classitems.description: Fired when a new post created.
classitems.name: new

classitems.description:
Loads post files.

This function does:

- {{#crossLink "Hexo.theme/load"}}Hexo.theme/load{{/crossLink}}: Loads theme files
- {{#crossLink "Hexo.theme/watch"}}Hexo.theme/watch{{/crossLink}}: Watches theme files (When `options.watch` is true)
- {{#crossLink "Hexo.source/load"}}Hexo.source/load{{/crossLink}}: Loads source files
- {{#crossLink "Hexo.source/watch"}}Hexo.source/watch{{/crossLink}}: Watches source files (When `options.watch` is true)
- {{#crossLink "Hexo.theme/generate"}}Hexo.theme/generate{{/crossLink}}: Runs generators
classitems.name: load

props.name: watch
props.description: Watch source files

classitems.description:
Renders post contents.

Rendering flow:

- Compiles with Swig
- Runs pre-filter
- Compiles with Markdown (or other render engines, depends on the extension name of source files)
- Runs post-filter
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Creates a snippet of HTML tag. **Examples:** ``` html_tag('a', {href: 'http://www.google.com'}, 'Google'); html_tag('img', {src: 'foo.jpg'}); ``` yields: ``` Google ```
classitems.name: html_tag

classitems.description: Returns the plural form of the string.

classitems.description: Returns the singular form of the string.
classitems.name: singularize

classitems.description: Returns an underscored, lowercased form of the string.

classitems.description: Capitalizes the first word, turns underscores into spaces and strip a trailing "_id".
classitems.name: humanize

classitems.description:
Capitalizes all the words, except for articles, prepositions, and conjunctions.

`titleize` is also aliased as `titlecase`.
classitems.name: titleize

classitems.description: Creates a name of a table.
classitems.name: tableize

classitems.description: Replaces underscores with dashes in the string.
classitems.name: dasherize

classitems.description: Replaces special characters in a string so that it may be used as part of a pretty URL.
classitems.name: parameterize

classitems.description:
Creates a foreign key name from a class name. `separate_class_name_and_id_with_underscore` sets
whether the method should put '_' between the name and 'id'.
classitems.name: foreignKey

classitems.description:
Returns the suffix that should be added to a number to denote the position in
an ordered sequence such as 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th.
classitems.name: ordinal

classitems.description:
Turns a number into an ordinal string used to denote the position in an ordered sequence
such as 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th.
classitems.name: ordinalize

classitems.description: This function is invoked when the last task in the pool is done.
classitems.name: drain

classitems.description: This function is invoked when the number of pending tasks equals to the concurrency of the pool.
classitems.name: saturated

classitems.description: This function is invoked when the last task in the pool is started.
classitems.name: empty

classitems.description: Inserts a task to the pool.
classitems.name: _insert

classitems.description: Starts distributing tasks to each worker.
classitems.name: process

classitems.description: Adds a task to last of queue.
classitems.name: push

classitems.description: Adds a task to first of queue.
classitems.name: unshift

classitems.description: Returns the number of pending tasks.
classitems.name: length
